title: EU 'strongly' regrets US plan to double steel tariffs
description: The 27-member bloc says Donald Trump's move undermines efforts to reach a deal, warning of "countermeasures".
content:
The EU has said it "strongly" regrets Donald Trump's surprise plan to double US tariffs on steel and aluminium in a move that risks throwing bilateral trade talks into chaos.
